code: @Override protected RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(final RestRequest restRequest, final NodeClient client) throws IOException {     final FollowStatsAction.StatsRequest request = new FollowStatsAction.StatsRequest().     request.setIndices(Strings.splitStringByCommaToArray(restRequest.param("index"))).     return channel -> client.execute(FollowStatsAction.INSTANCE, request, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
